    "number": 84955,
    "data": "2,3,7,13,13,13,541,4594309,64649503,7577449963,2005324830163,39676048812109,272235769110157,494535766350049",
    "name": "Initial prime of a prime chain of length n under the iteration x->2x+5.",
    "comment": [
        "This is a special case of prime chains generated by f(x) = cx + d."
    ],
    "reference": [
        "D. H. Lehmer, On certain chains of primes, Proc. London Math. Soc. (3) 14a 1965 183-186."
    ],
    "example": [
        "a(3)=7 since 7, 2*7+5=19 and 2*19+5=43 are primes."
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A084954."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,more",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_W. Edwin Clark_, Jun 14 2003",
    "ext": [
        "More terms from _Don Reble_, Nov 07 2007"
